item.title: Report X-2024050254
item.description:
Report X-2024050254

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-03
  • City: ROGERS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipper has an exception to ship Reportable Quantities of UN2880. Inner container is a UNPOP drum whose bottom cracked. A plastic bag lining the inside of the UNPOP drum tore enough to allow some of the product to spill. Cleanup performed.
